input.sentences: going to my sister 's wedding . my baby so excited .
here 's my sister . beautiful as always .
i 'm getting teary eyed just looking at them .
beautiful cake done by my brother in law . he has his own bakery downtown .
output.sentences: Holding Sharon in my arms makes me think it was a hundred years ago that I got married but it was just two years ago.
Today, however, is not about me, but about my beautiful little sister and her wedding.
The ushers were so handsome lining the gate outside the botanical gardens.
The bridesmaids, though lovely, took a backseat to my sister as she and her new husband exchanged vows.
I enjoyed the magical day but I tell you I would be less than honest if I did not admit that eating wedding cake was the best part of the day.
